Uses of Interface
graphpack.IService

Packages that use IService
graphpack common GraphPack classes
the most important classes are GraphPackService, which manages a GraphPack service and GraphPackClient, which represents a client that can connect to GraphPack services 
graphpack.local local service, client and node abstractions (bridge design pattern) 
graphpack.remote contains interfaces for remote communication
 
graphpack.remote.rmi contains a concrete RMI implementation of IConnectionManager
ProxyXXXX classes are stubs used for remote access
IProxyXXXXFactory interfaces are needed in order to inject the ProxyXXXX classes
RemotableXXXX classes are RMI exported objects that receive incoming calls
IRemotableXXX interfaces are needed in order to publish the RemotableXXXX classes
 
 

Uses of IService in graphpack
 

Classes in graphpack that implement IService
 class GraphPackService
          An abstraction of a GraphPack service (bridge design pattern)
 class RmiInmemoryQuartzGraphPackService
          a concrete GraphPackService that is implemented using:
persistence = ClientStore, NodeStore, EdgeStore
connection = ConnectionManager
task management = TaskManager
 

Fields in graphpack declared as IService
(package private)  IService GraphPackService.local
           
(package private)  IService CommonNodeLocator.local
           
 

Methods in graphpack that return IService
 IService IClient.connect(java.lang.String targetService)
          connect to a remote service using this client credentials
 IService GraphPackClient.Connector.toService(java.lang.String targetService)
          connect to remote service
 

Constructors in graphpack with parameters of type IService
CommonNodeLocator(IService local, IConnectionManager connectionManager)
           
 

Uses of IService in graphpack.local
 

Classes in graphpack.local that implement IService
 class Service
          a local service delegates persistence to injected IClientStore
delegates connection to injected IConnectionManager
 

Methods in graphpack.local that return IService
 IService Client.connect(java.lang.String targetService)
           
 

Uses of IService in graphpack.remote
 

Fields in graphpack.remote declared as IService
(package private)  IService Gateway.Service.service
           
 

Methods in graphpack.remote that return IService
 IService Gateway.Client.connect(ClientLocation sender, java.lang.String targetService)
           
 IService IConnectionManager.connect(java.lang.String sourceService, java.lang.String sourceClient, java.lang.String targetService)
          connects to a remote service
 

Methods in graphpack.remote with parameters of type IService
 void IConnectionManager.export(java.lang.String serviceName, IService service)
          makes an service available remotely
the service can be made unavailable using IConnectionManager.unexport()
 

Constructors in graphpack.remote with parameters of type IService
